notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was supported by the World Reference Center for Emerging Viruses and Arboviruses, NIH grant AI120942, the Small Grant from the Royal Society of Tropical Medicine and Hygiene (RSTMH), the EMRO/TDR joint small grant (ID no. SGS 18-87), the Foreign Fulbright Sudan (E0610128), and the Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council, grant numbers BBS/E/I/00007031, BBS/E/I/00007033 and BBS/E/I/00007036.
